EmailTemplate.name: Remediation Reversal Email Notification
EmailTemplate.Body:
Hello,
This email is to inform you that the revoked access/account for $nativeIdentity within the application $application will be reversed as a part of the Use It or Lose It Initiative. This means you have submitted a request to re-instate the access or account within the application and the request is in progress. Please refer to the Deloitte Use it or Lose It FAQ to understand how the whole process works.
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying Remediation Reversal Completion.
EmailTemplate.Subject: Use It or Lose It Remediation Reversal for $identityName within $application
